content: It's time to wake up. You lie, paralyzed by delirium, in a dark forest with dense overgrowth. Discerning between day and night is almost impossible; light barely penetrates the foliage above.
It's time to wake up. You lay, paralyzed with delirium, in a dark forest with dense overgrowth. Discerning day and night is almost impossible as any light can barely penetrate the foliage.
